Reviews.Title: excellent quality for the low price
Reviews.Author: Devkia R.
Reviews.Content: great choice, quality is excellent, clean image, and great price. The only thing is you would need a bnc to rca adaptor make the connection between the dvr and your tv set.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG SDE-5003N
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: GOOD SYSTEM, EASY TO SETUP HARDWARE. CAMERA MOUNTS COULD BE BETTER, ONE BAD CAMERA CABLE, STILL WORKING ON GETTING REPLACEMENT UNDER WARRENTY. ALSO THE CAMERA POWER SUPPLY WILL BE A MUST IF USING ALL 16 CAMERAS BECAUSE OF THE STACK DESIGN ON THE BACK OF THE DVR WOULD MAKE IT OVER A FOOT IN DEPTH TOO BIG FOR A SHELF. SOFTWARE IS EASY TO USE, HAVE NOT SETUP EMAIL OR PHONE APP.

ProductInfo.Features:
Cameras in the system record at 480TVL
Record discreetly up to 50ft of night time conditions
Cameras rated IP65, making them dust and weather proof
Dependable security and features developed with your convenience in mind
Anytime/Anywhere viewing you can monitor your system on the go on your phone or on a PC
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SDE-5003N 16 Channel DVR Security System 1TB HDD with 8 Bullet Cameras
